Module org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi
Package org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi

Class AFUNIXRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi.AFUNIXRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.registry.Registry, java.rmi.Remote
    public final class AFUNIXRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.rmi.registry.Registry
    A wrapper for RMI registries, both remote and local, to allow for a clean removal of bound resources upon shutdown.
    Author:
    Christian Kohlschütter
